vlive.korean: [어떻게 버티지...?] 10분... [How am I going to wait until then?] 10 minutes... 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림 시즌2] 장도연&한보름&경리가 보여준다, 사다드림 라이브 삼행시!_마지막회
vlive.english: [How am I going to wait until then?] 10 minutes...

vlive.korean: 그런데 수요일이 되면 그날 하루를 어떻게 버티지? When Wednesday comes around... How will I ever wait? 듣기 View video V Special : [Full] 이리와 안아줘 X 앞터V (Come and Hug me X Early Interview)
vlive.english: When Wednesday comes around... How will I ever wait?

vlive.korean: 야, 너 자꾸 이럴 거야? 흔들리는데 이러면, 버티지 마! - 야! 야! - 아니야! 가만히 있어! Will you keep doing this? It's shaking! Don't hold it up! - Hey! - Stay still! 듣기 View video EXO : 토요일은첸백시
vlive.english: Will you keep doing this? It's shaking! Don't hold it up! - Hey! - Stay still!

vlive.korean: 꽉 대고 있어야지, 떨면서 대면 다 버티지. You have to put your fingers on it. 듣기 View video KNK : 지금 크나큰(KNK)은?
vlive.english: You have to put your fingers on it.

vlive.korean: [심장 폭행] 더 이상은 내 심장이 버티지 못해! [Heart attack] I can't handle this much longer! 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [존잘러] SF9 로운 편
vlive.english: [Heart attack] I can't handle this much longer!

examples.korean: They were afraid the dam wouldn’t hold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 댐이 버티지 못할 것이라고 우려했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were afraid the dam wouldn’t hold. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Lots of people leave this job because they can’t hack it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 많은 사람들이 버티지를 못해서 이 직장을 떠난다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lots of people leave this job because they can’t hack it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The boxer couldn’t go the limit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 권투 선수는 최종 라운드까지 버티지 못했다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The boxer couldn’t go the limit. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Lee told the group that many North Koreans don't last longer than a year in any job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이씨는 그 그룹의 사람들에게 많은 북한 사람들이 어떤 일자리든 1년 이상을 버티지 못한다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Lee told the group that many North Koreans don't last longer than a year in any job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Long songs don't usually last long on the song charts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 긴 노래는 대개 노래 순위에서 오래 버티지 못한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Long songs don't usually last long on the song charts. Add to Wordbook
